headline: ‘Hear Ye, Hear Ye’: A Step-by-Step Guide To a Trial in the Senate
abstract: When the House votes to send articles of impeachment to the Senate, it sets off a series of choreographed steps — some well-defined, others up for debate — that will shape the Senate trial.
lead_paragraph: [Follow our live coverage and updates of the Trump impeachment trial.]
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
